Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

Q:

Which 3D sound provider should I use?

A:

There are pros and cons to using any of the providers. Read about the details on each provider in the 3D Digital Audio Services Section.

In any case, you should not try to auto-configure because it takes a fair amount of time for the hardware providers to fail. You game would take forever to load.

Instead, we recommend using the Miles Fast 2D provider as your default - it's fast, has good reverb and occlusion support and, most importantly, will always work! Then, you can allow the user to change this default somewhere in your game's user interface.
